original: Na taṃ sippaṃ na taṃ dhanaṃ.
analyzed: na tam sippam na tam dhanam
sukkhaḥ api candana taru na jahāti gandham

original: Nāgo gato naramukhe na jahāti līḷaṃ;
analyzed: nāgaḥ gataḥ nara mukhe na jahāti līḍam
yantā gataḥ madhu rasam na jahāti ucchu
dukkhaḥ api paṇḍita janaḥ na jahāti dhammaṃ
ku desam ca ku mittam ca
sā nārī seṭṭhā iti vadanti paṇḍitā
alasaḥ gihī kāma bhogī na sādhu
na ā t ca asanna upavātake
